name: Copernic Inc.
overview: Copernic Inc. provides search technology for the Web and desktop space. The company delivers its search technology through its online properties, including mamma.com and copernic.com. Copernic Inc., through its Copernic Desktop Search software search engine product, develops search solutions, which allow instant searching of files, calendar, emails, and email attachments stored on a personal computer hard drive. The company also provides online advertising and content to its partnerships worldwide. In addition, it offers customized development and maintenance support services. Copernic Inc. serves customers primarily in the United States, Europe, and Canada. The company was formerly known as Mamma.com Inc. and changed its name to Copernic Inc. in June 2007.
